ygData.subject: Re: More advice please.
ygData.msgSnippet: everything Chris said is correct with one exception: The less useful spells are halo of light, endure disease and endure ... Hmmm Chris could you be an
ygData.messageBody:
everything Chris said is correct with one exception:

<snip>The less useful spells are halo of light, endure disease and endure
>cold.
Hmmm Chris could you be an elfy by chance?? well he is kinda right this
spell wont help you kill anything at all....but...and its a BIG but... if
you do not have infra vision,ie-human or the like...pleazs at first chance
get this spell !!!! i too thought bah why buy it..then i died in unrest i
was bound just outside and low and behold, my stuff was on corpseie-Gtr LS
duh human=blind..i freaked till i realized i had bought that spell *wipes
the sweat off her brow*
LOL anyway i sure am glad i bought it it has saved my time getting back to
corpse alot, but endure disease and clod are 2 spells that are scribed and
have never been used but hey,,,ya never know!
Topaaz SpellBinder
Xegony =0)
